title: 19th Century for Sale: T5's, T203 & More
author: ernestreyes

posts.post_title: 19th Century for Sale: T5's, T203 & More
posts.post_content:
I've got a bunch of cards for sale that includes some T5's, T203's, R&S Artistic Scraps, Victorian Trade Cards, Postcards and vintage Boxing.  Go to my website to see them all [URL="http://imageevent.com/ernestreyes/forsaletrade?n=0"]here[/URL].  Everything postpaid and discounts available for multiple purchases.  Heck, I'll consider any reasonable offer.
[url]http://imageevent.com/ernestreyes/forsaletrade?n=0[/url]

Philadelphia Athletics catcher Jack Lapp #516.  Not in the best condition.  $95.00 postpaid.
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ernestreyes/forsaletrade/websize/pinkerton_1.JPG[/IMG]

1900 T203 Mayo's Baseball Comics.  "Rooting For the Home Team"  Pin hole at top.  $45.00- postpaid. 
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ernestreyes/forsaletrade/websize/t203.4.JPG[/IMG]

1888 R & S Artistic Scraps- St Louis.  Missing ball in hand.  $45.00 postpaid. 
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ernestreyes/forsaletrade/websize/RSstlouis.JPG[/IMG]

Circa 1880's Victorian Trade Card- Red Border "Not Out (Umpire)"  Very Scarce.  $25.00- postpaid. 
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ernestreyes/forsaletrade/websize/Untitled-2%20copy.JPG[/IMG]
